name: Lazer Eyes 3D
description:
Lazer Eyes is the hero of Cosmopolis. He can shoot lasers from his eyes, except he does not have full control of both eyes. Focus down your targets with both eyes to zap them. Defeat the evil Dr. Spectacle and save the city.

This game was made as part of the GMTK Game Jam 2021.

Game designer and programmer: Zeyad Elbadrawy
Composer and narrative designer: Yousif "Jimmy" Abouzgaya
